column2: "As expected, the Dragonkin are really strong. And you're not too shabby yourself for dealing with them so easily."
"Lately, the Dragonkin have been unusually aggressive towards the ARKS. It wasn't always this way."
"The ARKS and Dragonkin actually communicated to an extent."
"We've translated their language, so we should be able to understand them."
"He'll probably see you as a threat. Leave this to me."

"Hey there! Dragonkin! My name
is Aki. Will you listen to what I have to say?"
"He's responding to my words. So they do understand us... I see, I see..."
"I guess we're pretty clearly being ignored, regardless of language. That kind of irritates me, actually."
"Heh heh heh... This just makes me want to communicate all the more!"
"Just you wait! You'll see just how difficult it is to ignore me!"
"Ah! Professor! Wait! It's no use. She ran off again."
"But that Dragonkin just now didn't attack us. I wonder why..."
"Playing it cool? I'm not sure I understand what you mean."
"While we're talking, she's getting farther away. Let's go, <%me>."
